r.s: Reader for the MaxMind DB file format
r.d: This is the PHP extension for reading MaxMind DB files. MaxMind DB is a binary file format that stores data indexed by IP address subnets (IPv4 or IPv6).
r.n: * Fix a `TypeError` exception in the pure PHP reader when using large databases on 32-bit PHP builds with the `bcmath` extension. Reported by dodo1708. GitHub #124.
